title: Field to Fork 2019: Best Management Practices to Produce More Potatoes

tasks.task: Suzie Thompson discusses potato farming and best practices for gardeners.
subtasks: Botany of potatoes (family, origin, tuber structure).
Potato industry overview (production, market classes, nutritional value).
Potato breeding program at NDSU (history, goals, cultivar releases).
Soil and climate requirements for potato growth.
Propagation methods for potato seeds (clonal vs. true seed).
Planting techniques for potatoes (spacing, fertilization, hilling).
Pesticide and disease management (weeds, insects, common diseases).
Harvest and storage considerations (temperature, humidity, curing).
